context.p: Use the euare-userlistbypath command to list all the users in an account or to list all the users with a particular path prefix. The output lists the ARN for each resulting user.

Use the euare-userlistgroups command to list all the groups a particular user is in. The output lists the ARNs for the groups the user is in. For more information about ARNs and paths, see Identifiers for IAM Entities.
